entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.0°C

Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -21.6°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 16 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 16 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
